Package GameModes

Class Game

java.lang.Object
GameModes.Game
Direct Known Subclasses:
NormalModeGame
public abstract class Game
extends java.lang.Object
Abstract class to handle all gameplay

    • Game

      public Game​(java.lang.Class<? extends BoardGUI> boardType, int dim, int mines, double clusteringThreshold, int h, int w)
      Constructor for Game
      Parameters:
      boardType - the type of board
      dim - the dimension of the board
      mines - the number of mines on the board
      clusteringThreshold - the clustering threshold value
      h - the height of the board
      w - the width of the board
